b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Muhammad Putra Romadhoni, Born in Jember October 30, 2004, I was in Kindergarten when my friends were still playing football and others I preferred to rent PS which was still PS2, and when I was in elementary school, I played at the internet cafe until middle school, I I'm curious about programming and when I was in high school I majored in TKJ. I started learning coding from 2022, also learned hacking, and others. I want to share my experience or rather the knowledge that I got self-taught, thank you so much...
